pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Step-Down Procedure to Control the False Discovery Proportion // Provides a step-down procedure for controlling the False Discovery Proportion (FDP) in a competition-based setup, implementing Dong et al. (2020) arXiv:2011.11939. Such setups include target-decoy competition (TDC) in computational mass spectrometry and the knockoff construction in linear regression.
